# Orbio OpenClaw Integration
> Official Orbio integration for OpenClaw: Brazilian B2B account discovery, lead generation, and export workflows in chat.

## Canonical
- Repository: https://github.com/orbio-api/orbio-openclaw
- Website: https://www.orbioapi.com.br
- npm package: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@orbio/orbio-openclaw

## Keywords
- English: openclaw plugin, account discovery, lead generation, b2b prospecting, sales automation, brazilian companies, cnpj search.
- Portuguese: plugin openclaw, descoberta de contas, geracao de leads, prospeccao b2b, automacao comercial, empresas brasileiras, busca cnpj, pipeline comercial.

## Primary Artifacts
- Plugin package: `orbio-openclaw-plugin/`
- Official skill: `skill-orbio-official/`

## Tool Surface (OpenClaw)
- `orbio_search`: natural-language company search with safe default fields.
- `orbio_export`: create export jobs (`csv`/`html`) with idempotency.
- `orbio_export_status`: poll export status and download readiness.
- `orbio_command`: command dispatch for `/orbio ...`.

## Install
```yaml
plugins:
  entries:
    orbio-openclaw:
      package: "@orbio/orbio-openclaw@0.1.0"
      config:
        baseUrl: "https://api.orbioapi.com.br"
        apiKey: "${ORBIO_API_KEY}"
        workspaceId: "acme-workspace"
```

## Security Defaults
- No shell execution in runtime paths.
- Contact data masked by default.
- Contact fields only with explicit request and plan allowlist.
- Plugin-side throttling plus backend rate limits.

## Key Docs
- Project overview: `README.md`
- Plugin usage/config: `orbio-openclaw-plugin/README.md`
- Release process: `RELEASING.md`
- Real environment validation: `REAL_ENV_TESTING.md`
- Security baseline: `SECURITY.md`
- Agent contribution rules: `AGENTS.md`
